long_description: Ready for a week's worth of campsite cooking or a big BBQ at the park, the Coleman Extreme 5 wheeled cooler keeps food and beverages cool and fresh in hot summer weather. Pack the generous 100 L capacity full of provisions for family outings. Xtreme 5(R) technology keeps ice solid up to 5 days in temperatures up to 90degF and still performs well in even hotter weather. Hinged lid includes 4 cup holders to keep drinks close at hand. Dual carry handles and durable wheels make toting and rolling the cooler a breeze. Rustproof, leak-resistant tilted drain channel makes clean-up a cinch when it's time to pack up and head out.
short_description: Ready for a week's worth of campsite cooking or a big BBQ at the park, the Coleman Extreme 5 wheeled cooler keeps food and beverages cool and fresh in hot summer weather.
